page.title: 14FARMING-UPPER ATCHLEY FARM
page.content: Farming forms the biggest activity in the whole area and mainly takes two forms i.e. animal rearing or mixed farming.We looked at one example of each type of farm,Atchley Manor Farm and Upper Atchley Farm. Upper Atchley Farm is 500 acres in area,over half of which is used for the production of food for the 2,000 plus pigs they keep.Feld size varies from 33 acres to as small as 3 acres. They grow 160 acres of Barley,60 acres of Wheat and 5 acres of assorted vegetables.They keep 160 breeding sows and 4 stud boars which produce over 2,ooo piglets a year which are fattened for Pork.The farm is heavily mechanised having 13 tractors,a combine harvester,planters,sprayers and a baler.They are virtually self sufficient and employ 25 men full time as drivers, pigmen and general help.
